message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.NE, cs.AI 

This paper deals with the training of recurrent neural networks for speech recognition, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses various optimization techniques for training neural networks, which falls under the category of machine learning (ML). Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of parallelization techniques, which falls under the category of systems and control (SD). Therefore, cs.SD (Systems and Control) is another likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of stochastic optimization techniques, which falls under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (NE). Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of various optimization techniques, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another likely sub-category.
